title: No time to keep up with celebrities? Don't worry, our entertainment newsletter does it for you.
text:
CLOSE Celine Dion, Billy Porter, Lena Waithe and more celebrities take over the Met Gala red carpet and explore the theme, "Notes on Fashion." Josmar Taveras, USA TODAY

Do you struggle putting together a Kardashian family tree? Don't know who got the final rose on the "Bachelorette" last night? Can't name which movies scored Oscar nominations?

Look no further, because USA TODAY's Entertainment newsletter will have you talking like a pop-culture junkie in no time (maybe even more than you hoped.)

Think of it as your perfect mid-day snack. When the afternoon rolls around, check your inbox for an easily digestible roundup of entertainment news.

Subscribe to USA TODAY's Entertainment newsletter here.

What can you expect in your inbox? Breaking news and gossip on the hottest celebrities, TV, movies, music and book reviews, and answers to all the latest gossip.

Exclusive interviews with some of your favorite stars and photo galleries from Hollywood's top events can also be found in the roundup.
